meanings.definition: To import or export goods secretly and illegally.
meanings.sent1: The pirate smuggles gold coins in his coat pocket.
meanings.sent2: The criminal smuggles drugs across the border.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon smuggles snacks from the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The shadowy figure smuggles secrets through the dark alleys.
meanings.sent5: The spy smuggles classified documents under cover of night.

meanings.definition: To bring in or take out secretly and illegally.
meanings.sent1: She smuggles forbidden books into the country.
meanings.sent2: The thief smuggles stolen goods out of the store.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat smuggles toys from the neighbor's yard.
meanings.sent4: The ghostly presence smuggles chills down your spine.
meanings.sent5: The magician smuggles a rabbit out of an empty hat.

meanings.sent1: The smuggler smuggles contraband in hidden compartments.
meanings.sent2: The illegal operation smuggles weapons across the border.
meanings.sent3: The clever squirrel smuggles acorns into its tree trunk hideout.
meanings.sent4: The mysterious fog smuggles the city into a dreamlike state.
meanings.sent5: The time traveler smuggles futuristic technology to the past.
